item.title: Flutter Part 1: Install
item.description:
Install (macOS)

  1. Download Flutter SDK and unzip
  2. Add path to .zshrc
export PATH="$PATH:[PATH_OF_DIRECTORY]/flutter/bin"
  1. Pre-download tools
flutter precache

esther

Make sure that you unzip the flutter folder into the right directory. If you’d like to move the flutter folder after ran flutter, you might see the same error as mine. ğŸ™ˆ

Highlight: What is the Future of Front End Web Development? ã€€ãƒ»User expectations on the rise. ã€€ãƒ»New JavaScript is here. ã€€ãƒ»We’re not building pages, we’re building systems. ã€€ãƒ»The line between native and web is blurring. ã€€ãƒ»URLs are still a killer feature. ã€€ãƒ»Performance is a key player. ã€€ãƒ»CSS will get much more modular. ã€€ãƒ»CSS preprocessing will slowly fade away. ã€€ãƒ»Being good at HTML and CSS remains vital. ã€€ãƒ»Build processes will get competitive.

item.title: CSS Methodologies
item.description:
CSS æ–¹æ³•è«–å€‘
